transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello, Ilma ji?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ilma ji bol rahe hain?
Customer: Ji ji ji sir bataiye.
Executive: Okay. A, maine aapko isliye phone kiya ki aapka wo dekh liya maine proposal. Actually, ha mujhe bharna hai 42750 plus GST. Total 50445 mere ko bharna hai, theek hai ek saal ka.
Customer: Ha sir. After discount bata rahe hain maine kar liya.
Executive: Thank you. Maine confirmation kiya, mere ko, mere ko final figure mere ko jo GST ke sath aayegi 50445, theek hai?
Customer: Ji sir.
Executive: Okay. Ye TrustSeal ka ek saal ka aayega.
Customer: Ji sir.
Executive: Aapki aawaz [inaudible]
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Hello. Ji sir. Aap kya lunch mein ho abhi?
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi sir, main available hu.
Executive: Achcha ha, lunch mein ho to phir baad mein baat karte hain.
Customer: Nahi main available hu sir abhi.
Executive: Okay, theek hai, koi baat nahi. Ye upar jo aap TrustSeal ka jo features hai wo sab features aa jayega usme, theek hai na? Ek saal ke liye.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Okay, a, theek hai, main ek send karta hu aapko lagbhag ek do din ke andar wo main aapko payment ka set karta hu.
Customer: Achcha, theek hai. Aur aap payment kaise karenge online sir?
Executive: Main online, online karunga main.
Customer: Achcha. Aapka wo ha, a, main hai na abhi aisa hu na to thodi der mein a, aapka agar wo wo dekh lo na aap, warna mere ko aapka number to actually kya hai ki mera NEFT ka jo details aapka hai na wo to hai hi mere paas par main confirmation karna chahunga.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Aisa ho to mere ko ek baar WhatsApp kar dena aapka ha, aapka WhatsApp kar do na kya hai.
Customer: Bank details. Bank details, ha, ek baar main confirm kar lu.
Customer: Achcha sir, ek request kar rahi thi.
Executive: Ha? Aap, aap okay ho na ye jitne bhi maine aapko saari cheeze share kiya hai. Main ek request kar rahi thi sir, jo aap ek do din keh rahe ho, aaj possible ho payega kya?
Executive: Actually kya hai ke main aapko phone pehle karne wala tha par aaj meri meeting chal rahi hai beech mein bhi gap hai, abhi khana khane hi baitha tha usse pehle maine aapko phone kiya. Abhi party meri aa rahi hai. Aaj ya kal, kal tak aapka ho jayega, wo main set kar deta hu.
Customer: Alright sir. Theek hai sir. Kal tak ho jayega. Achcha agar shaam tak hota hai to main shaam tak, shaam ko bhi kar dunga jaise free hota hai. Kyunki aaj mera meeting zyada hai. Uski wajah se ha. Main aapko phone pehle karne wala tha.
Executive: 12 baje aapka jo message aaya na, usi time karne wala tha.
Customer: Ji sir. Theek hai? Achcha.
Executive: To ye, ye bas ye, mere ko yahi jaanna tha ki 50445 mere ko bharna hai ek saal ke liye TrustSeal ka. Aur upar jo aapne, aapne jo likha hai 20 buyleads per week within additional. Ha ye saari cheeze milengi sir.
Customer: Wo sab milega, theek hai na? Okay.
Customer: Ji sir. Iske liye aapko bas ye confirmation ke liye maine call kiya tha.
Customer: Okay. Sir main bas ye keh rahi thi, aap ek baar dekh lijiyega aaj possible ho jaye to well and good rahega.
Executive: Aaj jo, aaj ho jayega to main kar dunga warna kal to pakka hi hai.
Customer: Theek hai sir. Main aapko bank details maine aapko share kar diye hain sir. Theek hai?
Executive: Theek hai, main wo dekh leta hu main. Theek hai? Theek hai aur theek hai sir. Okay.
Executive: Bolie, par kuch bolna chahte the aap?
Executive: Hello?
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to confirm payment amount.

- Customer requests payment to be done today.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed the final amount with GST.

- Executive assured payment will be done by tomorrow.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will check bank details and process payment.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- payment, trustseal, bank details, confirmation
